Package ure.math

Class UPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • ure.math.UPath
  • public class UPath
extends java.lang.Object
    UPath implements A* pathfinding. To use, create an instance of UPath and call .nextStep() to find the next step toward a destination from a source. TODO: bugs and inefficiencies

      • nextStep

        public int[] nextStep​(UArea area,
                      int x1,
                      int y1,
                      int x2,
                      int y2,
                      UActor actor,
                      int range)
        Perform A* pathfinding between the two given points and return the next step from the first point to reach the second.
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor to use for deciding passability. Can be null.
        range - No steps further than this from the start will be considered.
        Returns:
        (x,y) walk delta of next step
